text: [Chapter 17c] [Sazuki Field, Western Nolavillia]
It's getting dark, we'll have to camp out here for the night.
[The next day...]
Hmmm? What's that noise?
Everyone! We're surrounded by Xuirists!
Prepare for battle!
We've managed to survive the attack, but it seems like the Xuirists will keep hunting us while we're in Nolavillia.
We should head to Nation as quickly as possible.
Hey, you there!
Could you open the cage I'm stuck in?
Why are you in that cage?
The Xuirists captured me after I escaped from the Shadow Realm.
I think they were going to sacrifice me.
The Shadow Realm?
Yeah, I'm something called a "Proto-Xuir", a failed clone of some dimensional called the "True Xuir".
You're a Xuir?
Yeah I just said that.
[Proton opens the cage]
Thanks.
I'd stick around, but there's something I have to do.
There are some other Proto-Xuirs that escaped with me, and one of them was captured by the Xuirists.
There's other Proto-Xuirs?
Yeah, it's not like I'm the only one.
Nolavillia is truly a strange place, to think that there would be so many other Xuirs...
Huh?
Sorry, this is my first time in Nolavillia since I escaped from the Shadow Realm 20 years ago.
Are you also a Proto-Xuir?
Yes.
20 years ago... are you Xuirond?
I don't this so.
My engraving says G3 N2.
Ah, so you are Xuirond.
We thought you died years ago.
Of course, we don't really remember you since we were still young.
Generation 3 Number 7.

speaker: right
text: We weren't given names so, Xuirventh is just a name I made up a few years ago.

speaker: right
text: So, what do you go by these days, Xuirond?
Proton.

speaker: right
text: Fancy name, doesn't have to do with numbers either.

speaker: right
text: You said you left, Nolavillia, but why did you come back.

speaker: right
text: Two decades later seems like a pretty strange time to return.
I'm here to stop the Shadow Realm Research Center.

speaker: right
text: Huh?
The Research Center has recently obtained a powerful item called the Holy Itucher.
With such power, they could easily end the world.

speaker: right
text: If you're heading to the Shadow Realm, you'll need to go to the Nation of Nation.

speaker: right
text: But on you're way, you'll likely pass by the Xuirist Cavern.

speaker: right
text: If you want to team up and help me free Xuirfth, I'll probably be able to convince them to help you stop the Shadow Realm.

speaker: right
text: You'll probably have to fight those Xuirists anyways.
[Recruit Xuirventh] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: Well, I've gotta go fight some Xuirists.
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: right
text: Scien, are you alright?
The Nation of Nation, the Altar must still stand...
That person, Xuirventh, they said they escaped from the Shadow Realm.
The only safe place in Nolavillia to hide from the Shadow Realm is in Nation.
We need to keep going.
We must retrieve the Itucher before they can destroy Nation and the rest of the world.
[Scien and Proton leveled up!]
[Xuirist Cavern]
Omega, has the dispatch responded yet?
No, sir.
It is likely that they have been defeated.
Omega, you do realize that failure will not be accepted.
Yes, yes I do.
If you fail, I will destroy them.
Do not fail.
